tag_list: entrepreneur, mobile-applications, mobile-application-development, lead-generation, product-development, product-marketing, and-advertising
overview:
Entrepreneur with 15 years experience founding/growing internet and media companies. Specific duties include raising capital, structuring corporations, managing growth, creating partnerships and distribution strategies, advertising, sales, and marketing.

Matt McLean is the founder of Nuikea, a mobile application development and mobile application review site. He also serves as COO and board member for Calcey Technologies. Matt began his career in technology in 1998 as a web manager with Nortel Networks and later as a business manager for CNET Networks. He then combined his high-tech experience with his lifelong entrepreneurial spirit to co-founded CompareNetworks in 2000. As Chief Operating Officer Matt was instrumental in raising CompareNetworksâ€™ $1,000,000 seed round despite the wariness of web-based markets in a post-bubble economy. With Mattâ€™s help, CompareNetworks grew to six vertical marketplaces. The company now generates $12 million in annual revenue. Matt played a critical role in the companyâ€™s recent raising of a $10 million in private equity financing.
